Subtitle: Subtitle
Generally, use 1 for male to female conv: Generally, use 1 for male to female conversions and -1 for vice-versa. (Octaves)
Changes pitch/key of vocals and instrume: Changes pitch/key of vocals and instrumentals together. Altering this slightly reduces sound quality. (Semitones)
Controls how much of the AI voice's acce: Controls how much of the AI voice's accent to keep in the vocals
If >=3: apply median filtering median fi: If >=3: apply median filtering median filtering to the harvested pitch results. Can reduce breathiness
Control how much to mimic the original v: Control how much to mimic the original vocal's loudness (0) or a fixed loudness (1)
Protect voiceless consonants and breath: Protect voiceless consonants and breath sounds. Set to 0.5 to disable.
The larger the room, the longer the reve: The larger the room, the longer the reverb time
Level of AI vocals with reverb: Level of AI vocals with reverb
Level of AI vocals without reverb: Level of AI vocals without reverb
Absorption of high frequencies in the re: Absorption of high frequencies in the reverb
Only one is uploaded in order: Only one is uploaded in order
float - quality first, int - speed first: float - quality first, int - speed first
Placeholder for Source Text:
The uploaded subtitle file will be displayed here.
If there is no subtitle file, try entering text directly.
Both entered subtitles and text can be edited.
Placeholder for Source VTT:
The process will begin after the Whisper model download is complete.
Please check the Windows Command Prompt for the work progress.
High-performance NVIDIA Graphics Card is required for real-time translation.

== Recommended Settings for Low-end PCs ==
Whisper Engine: Faster-Whisper
Whisper Model: medium, small, base
Compute Type: int8 or int8_float16
Placeholder for Source SRT:
The subtitles recognized by Whisper will be displayed here.
If you already have subtitles, you can copy and paste the content.
The subtitles can be edited, and the edited content will be reflected in the translation and speech synthesis.

Mode 0 removes lesser artifacts, preserv: Mode 0 removes lesser artifacts, preserves low gradient information better, and is suited for higher bitrate videos.
Mode 0 enhances less and removes more en: Mode 0 enhances less and removes more encoding artifacts and is suited for lower-quality videos.
Adjust compression quality (0-51, lower: Adjust compression quality (0-51, lower is better quality. Default is 23)
